title: If You Are a Dodder Flower - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Caring Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   College/University   Complex Family Relationships   Death of Loved Ones   Dense Protagonist   Depression   Determined Protagonist   Different Social Status   Doting Older Siblings   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Family   Female Protagonist   Inferiority Complex   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Military   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Past Plays a Big Role   Playboys   Popular Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Pregnancy   Reincarnation   Second Chance   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Sister Complex   Unrequited Love   Weak Protagonist   Wealthy Characters
author: Xiu Ce   袖侧
description:
In her previous life, she tried her best, she struggled. In the end, she has lost to her own mediocrity. 

In this life, she resigned to her fate.

After her mother passed away, Xia Rou reincarnated as an orphan and she got taken in by her mother’s lover. Once again she stepped into Cao family, and once again she had to confront the people she loved and hated…

She dares not to expect anything, only except that she won’t suffer any more in this life…>
